java
@Transactional  // äº‹åŠ¡æ³¨è§£ä¿è¯åŸå­æ€§
public void deduct() {
    // ğŸš¨ æ³¨æ„ï¼šå¿…é¡»ç¡®ä¿æ‰€æœ‰æŸ¥è¯¢èµ°åŒä¸€ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œé¿å…æ­»é”
    List<Stock> stocks = stockMapper.queryStock("1002");
    
    Stock stock = stocks.stream()
                       .findFirst()
                       .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException("åº“å­˜ä¸å­˜åœ¨"));
    
    if (stock.getCount() > 0) {
        stock.setCount(stock.getCount() - 1);
        stockMapper.updateById(stock);
    }
}

MyBatis Mapper â€‹

java
public interface StockMapper extends BaseMapper<Stock> {
    @Select("SELECT * FROM tb_stock WHERE product_code = #{productCode} FOR UPDATE")
    List<Stock> queryStock(@Param("productCode") String productCode);
}
